public final class UserRW
extends DBTables
implements UserConstants

Database read-write operations related to students and instructors.

getObsoleteStudents

public static Map<String,String[][]> getObsoleteStudents(int responseAge,
                                                         int regdAge,
                                                         String institution)
                                                  throws DBException
Gets IDs and last response dates of students who either have not responded to a question since a certain date or who have never responded and have been registered since before a certain date.

Parameters:
responseAge - elapsed time in years since a student's last response for a student to be considered obsolete
regdAge - number of years ago a responseless student must have registered to be considered obsolete
institution - institution of the students, if any
Returns:
map of students' last response dates, keyed by their student IDs; we store last response date as a 2D array with one member, not just a string, to maintain consistency with getObsoleteInstructors()
Throws:
DBException

public static Map<String,String[][]> getObsoleteInstructors(int responseAge)
                                                     throws DBException
Gets IDs of instructors whose courses' assignments have not seen a response since a certain date.

Parameters:
responseAge - elapsed time in years since a student's last response for a course to be considered obsolete
Returns:
map of 2D array of course names and ID numbers, keyed by user ID
Throws:
DBException

getSameStudentData

private static String[] getSameStudentData(Connection con,
                                           String data,
                                           String institution,
                                           String userId,
                                           int type)
                                    throws SQLException
Determines whether there is a student with the given student number or email at the same institution OTHER than the one with the given userId (unless userId is null).

Parameters:
con - database connection
data - student's school ID number or email address
institution - name of institution
userId - login ID of user, or null to return any user
type - GET_STUDENTNUM or GET_EMAIL
Returns:
array of names of students with the given student number or email address at the same institution
Throws:
SQLException

setUser

public static void setUser(User user)
                    throws DBException,
                           UniquenessException,
                           StudentNumConstraintException,
                           StudentEmailExistsException
Changes a user's information. Disallows student changing student ID number to one already chosen by another student at the same institution, unless the student is working in an account created for exams. Also disallows student changing email address to one already used by a student with a different student ID number at the same institution. If user is a student and studentNum or institution changes, also enrolls the student in courses in which he or she is preenrolled, although it does NOT disenroll the student from any courses.

Parameters:
user - User containing the new information
Throws:
UniquenessException - when the login already exists
StudentNumConstraintException - when the student's ID number already exists at this institution and the student is not an exam student (temporary login)
StudentEmailExistsException - when the student's email already exists at this institution and the student is not an exam student (temporary login)
DBException

StudentEmailExistsException - when the student's email already exists at this institution and the student is not an exam student (temporary login)
DBException

removeUser

public static void removeUser(String userId)
                       throws DBException
Removes a user. If an instructor, removes locally authored questions, courses, assignments, responses to those assignments, coinstructorships, locally authored question sets, modified common question statements, authoring privileges. If a student, removes responses, instantiated assignments, and enrollment records.

Parameters:
userId - login ID of user
Throws:
DBException

removeUsers

public static void removeUsers(String[] userIds)
                        throws DBException
Removes users. Divides the users among instructors and students. Removes instructors' locally authored questions, courses, assignments, responses to those assignments, coinstructorships, locally authored question sets, modified common question statements, authoring privileges, languages. Removes students' responses, instantiated assignments, and enrollment records.

Parameters:
userIds - array of login ID of users
Throws:
DBException

                            throws DBException
